mapper.select: select a.id,a.field_id,a.sort,a.width,a.is_hide,b.type,b.field_name,b.name,b.options,b.component_type,b.is_fixed from `wk_hrm_employee_field_config` a left join `wk_hrm_employee_field` b on a.field_id = b.field_id where a.user_id = #{userId} order by a.sort

SELECT IFNULL(label_group, '1') as labelGroup, IFNULL(MAX(update_time), '2000-01-01 00:00:00') as update_time, '个人信息' as name FROM `wk_hrm_employee_field` WHERE label_group = 1 union all SELECT IFNULL(label_group, '2') as labelGroup, IFNULL(MAX(update_time), '2000-01-01 00:00:00') as update_time, '通讯信息' as name FROM `wk_hrm_employee_field` WHERE label_group = 2 union all SELECT IFNULL(label_group, '7') as labelGroup, IFNULL(MAX(update_time), '2000-01-01 00:00:00') as update_time, '联系人信息' as name FROM `wk_hrm_employee_field` WHERE label_group = 7 union all SELECT IFNULL(label_group, '11') as labelGroup, IFNULL(MAX(update_time), '2000-01-01 00:00:00') as update_time, '岗位信息' as name FROM `wk_hrm_employee_field` WHERE label_group = 11
select field_id,name,label_group,is_employee_visible,is_employee_update from wk_hrm_employee_field where label_group in (1,2) and `type` != 50 order by label_group,sorting
